duties_responsibilities.duty: Preparing initial and ongoing UCF IRB, central IRB, FDA applications, and ClinicalTrials.gov applications for new COM clinical research projects.
Interacting with COM faculty and staff regarding regulatory requirements.
Data entry of de-identified information into electronic case report forms.
Working with stakeholders to resolve issues and communicate progress.

Doing study coordination as needed; including informed consent sessions; study data collection; communicating with study participants; scheduling study visits; and data entry into the electronic medical records.
Working with UCF COM marketing to produce research flyers and keep the clinical research webpages updated.

Other activities as assigned by the Clinical Research Manager or the study principal investigator including maintenance of training and required certifications; attending meetings as assigned; and other assigned administrative duties.
Timely completion of required university and college training and updates.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's degree in a relevant field
